sources.snippet_or_excerpt: Crypto had a rough November. The pain is persisting into December — and that could signal trouble ahead for the stock market.
AI-powered sentiment signals give everyday traders the same edge institutions use. Delivered as clear, data-driven signals.
Crypto Alert: Bitcoin Slides Toward $84K, Traders Hunting Apeing as Next 100x Crypto While ETH and Tron Hold Strong
Crypto markets were already on edge heading into President Donald Trump's 9 PM EST primetime address to the nation from the White House.
More traders are turning to bots as the always-on crypto market demands faster execution than humans can deliver.

hypothesis_content.title: Intra-Regime Transition Timing
hypothesis_content.statement: When NEUTRAL regime persists for 10+ trading days with BTC price range <8%, and the 3-day correlation between BTC and SPY drops below 0.2 while crypto fear/greed moves from neutral (40-60) to extreme (>70 or <30), a regime transition (to BULL or BEAR) occurs within 3 days with >60% accuracy, providing timing edge for directional positioning.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended neutral periods with low volatility and decoupling from traditional markets represent equilibrium. Extreme sentiment shifts combined with funding rate changes indicate building pressure for directional move. Timing edge comes from anticipating regime transitions before they're widely recognized.
entry_conditions: Crypto Fear & Greed Index moves from 40-60 to >70 OR <30
BTC funding rates cross zero with magnitude > 0.005% (shift in perpetuals)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Conditions revert to stable neutral (correlation >0.4, F&G returns to 40-60)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Regime transition occurs in <50% of cases within 5 days, OR false signals (return to neutral) occur in >40% of cases when tested across 30+ instances.
